official_title: A bill to include home delivery of Children's publications in the existing rates for children's publications sent to schools.

summary.text: Extends the reduced postage rates currently in effect for classroom publications to the home delivery of children's educational publications which contain no paid advertising.

titles.title: A bill to include home delivery of Children's publications in the existing rates for children's publications sent to schools.
